title: How to Make Jolly Rancher Cookies

steps.headline: Prepare the Jolly Ranchers.
steps.description: Place the candies in a Ziploc bag and seal. Put this bag in another plastic bag and seal. Wrap bags in a dish towel and place on hard surface. Smash candies to bits using a potato masher or rolling pin. Set aside

steps.headline: Prepare the cookies for baking.
steps.description: Cover a baking sheet with foil. Spray this with nonstick cooking spray.

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F or 176 degrees C.
Prepare the cookie dough.
steps.description: Sprinkle flour on a work surface and roll dough till it is 1/4 inch in thickness.

steps.headline: Cut the cookies.
steps.description: Cut out cookies using the larger cookie cutter. Place these on the cookie sheet

steps.headline: Dip the smaller cookie cutter in flour and cut a hole in the middle of big cookies.
steps.description: Pull out the dough in the center and add it to other dough to re-use.

steps.headline: Remove from oven and sprinkle candy bits inside each cookie.
steps.description: Make sure to fill in any corners.

steps.headline: Remove from oven and let sit for 30 minutes.
Peel foil off of backs of cookies, now you can eat the cookies and savor the hard candy centers!

text: Prepare the Jolly Ranchers. Place the candies in a Ziploc bag and seal. Put this bag in another plastic bag and seal. Wrap bags in a dish towel and place on hard surface. Smash candies to bits using a potato masher or rolling pin. Set aside Prepare the cookies for baking. Cover a baking sheet with foil. Spray this with nonstick cooking spray. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F or 176 degrees C.  Prepare the cookie dough. Sprinkle flour on a work surface and roll dough till it is 1/4 inch in thickness. Cut the cookies. Cut out cookies using the larger cookie cutter. Place these on the cookie sheet Dip the smaller cookie cutter in flour and cut a hole in the middle of big cookies. Pull out the dough in the center and add it to other dough to re-use. Bake cookies for 4 minutes.  Remove from oven and sprinkle candy bits inside each cookie. Make sure to fill in any corners. Bake for 5-7 more minutes.  Remove from oven and let sit for 30 minutes.  Peel foil off of backs of cookies, now you can eat the cookies and savor the hard candy centers!
